# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    lines = String[]
    current_line = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) <= text_width
            current_line *= " " * word
        else
            push!(lines, current_line[2:end])
            current_line = word
        end
    end
    
    if !isempty(current_line)
        push!(lines, current_line[2:end])
    end
    
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

example_text = "This function will wrap words into lines"
wrapped_text = wrap_string(example_text)
println(wrapped_text)
```
